title: Isua hmangaihna leh thatna
lyrics:
Isua hmangaihna leh thatna,
Leh zahngaihna i fak ang;
Van ram in eng leh malsawmna,
Kan tan a han buatsaih a.

Van ram kan thlen hun chuanin,
Chu ni ropui chu kan lawm em em ang;
Lal Isua kan hmuhin,
Hnehtu chu fakin kan zai ang.

Van ram panin kan kal laiin,
Chhumte a lo zing thin ang;
Mahse, kan kal pelh hun chuanin,
Thim leh thawhpik a kiang.

Rinawm leh fal taka awmin,
Nitin rawng i bawl tlat ang;
A ropuina chang ve turin,
Dam chhungin i bei zel ang.

Kan hmaa lawmman um zelin,
A mawina kan thlir thuai ang;
Lungman tam kawngkaa lutin,
Rangkachak tual kan leng ang.
